# The Talking Horse and the Sad Girl and the Village Under the Sea

)]]
The Talking Horse and the Sad Girl and the Village Under the Sea is a collection of poetry by Mark Haddon published in 2005.[https://www.theguardian.com/books/2005/nov/06/poetry.markhaddon Observer review: The Talking Horse ... by Mark Haddon | Books | The Observer]
